mainHero.subtitle: BacPack.

items.title: Artisanal Quality
items.description: We specialize in producing high-quality, traditionally smoked buffalo meat using time-honored methods passed down through generations. The craftsmanship behind Tây Bắc's smoked buffalo meat is rooted in tradition and skill. Each step of the process, from the meticulous preparation to the slow smoking, requires deep knowledge and hands-on expertise. This attention to detail and respect for traditional methods makes our smoked buffalo meat not just a product, but a reflection of cultural heritage and craftsmanship that has been preserved through time.

items.title: Unmatched Taste
items.description: With the spiciness of chili combined with the heat of ginger, along with the seasoning of local seeds and the smoky aroma of firewood, these elements create the distinctive flavor of Tây Bắc's traditional smoked buffalo meat. When talking about buffalo meat from the Tây Bắc region, one must mention BacPack's smoked buffalo meat, a prime representation of this region's specialty

features.title: BacPack story
features.subtitle: A small start up with big goals!
features.description: Our startup is dedicated to preserving and sharing the rich culinary heritage of Vietnam's Tây Bắc region. By combining locally sourced ingredients with expert craftsmanship, we deliver an authentic taste experience that embodies the flavors of the mountains. Our mission is to bring this unique, artisanal delicacy to food lovers everywhere, while supporting local farmers and promoting sustainable practices.

items.name: Promote and Showcase Culture and Craftsmanship
items.description: To introduce and celebrate the rich, diverse, and authentic flavors of Vietnamese cuisine to a global audience.

items.name: Certified High-Quality, Locally Sourced Ingredients
items.description: To provide certified high-quality, locally sourced ingredients that highlight regional specialties and authentic flavors. Supporting local farmers, sustainable practices, and fair trade.

items.name: Inspire and Delight Customers
items.description: To inspire and delight customers through distinctive and meaningful culinary experiences that reflect the essence of Vietnamese cuisine.

items.name: Celebrate and Promote Local Artisans
items.description: To celebrate and promote local Vietnamese artisans and producers, ensuring their traditions and skills are preserved and appreciated.

items.name: 1000gr
features: Best value for families or large gatherings
